speaker: Applejack
text: Hoo-wee! Your very first princess summit. You must be over the moon, Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, I *am* excited. But, to be honest, I'm a little nervous, too.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You're 'nervicited'! It's like you wanna jump up and down and yell "YAY ME!!" But you also wanna curl up in a teeny-tiny ball and hide at the same time! We've all been there!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm there almost every day.

speaker: Applejack
text: You've got no reason to fret, Twi. Everything's gonna be just–

speaker: Rarity
text: TWILIGHT! Oh, sorry, darling, but I just realized you're not wearing your crown. You haven't forgotten it back in Ponyville, have you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's in my bag. Just feel a little self-conscious about wearing it. Haven't really gotten accustomed to *these* yet, either.

speaker: Rarity
text: You are a princess now, Twilight. Embrace it! I'm telling you, if I had a crown like that, I would never take it off. Why, I'd sleep in the thing.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Her highness, Princess Twilight Sparkle!

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: [laughs] Twilight! I haven't seen you since the coronation!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: We have so much to discuss. But it can wait until tomorrow. You all look tired from your journey. Now, off to bed, all of you.

speaker: Spike
text: What's wrong, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know, Spike. I'm just... worried, I guess. Princess Cadance was given the Crystal Empire to rule over. What if, now that I'm a princess, Celestia expects *me* to lead a kingdom of my own?

speaker: Spike
text: That would be *awesome*!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, it would *not*! Just because I have this crown and these wings, it doesn't mean I'll be a good leader!

speaker: Spike
text: Aw, sure ya will, Twilight. Now c'mon, you should get some shut-eye. Big day tomorrow! [sigh]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [grunts] Can't... tuck...! [grunts]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Just trying to get comfortable! Ugh!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Ugh!

speaker: Spike
text: Huh? What?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [yawns] My crown! She's got my crown! Stop! Thief! She's stolen my crown!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Stop! [grunts]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What did you do with my crown?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Sorry it had to be this way... *Princess*.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Who was that?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Sunset Shimmer. A former student of mine. She began her studies with me not long before Twilight. But when she did not get what she wanted as quickly as she liked, she turned cruel and dishonest. I tried to help her, but she eventually decided to abandon her studies and pursue her own path. One that has sadly led to her stealing your crown.

speaker: Spike
text: She replaced Twilight's with this one.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I suppose Sunset Shimmer thought you wouldn't notice right away that this was not yours. And by the time you did, it would be too late to go after your crown and Element of Harmony.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But I don't understand. Where did she go? Why did she take the crown?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You'll soon know more about this place than even I do.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: This is no ordinary mirror. It is a gateway to another world. A gateway that opens once every thirty moons.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Sparkly!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: It has always been kept in the throne room of Canterlot Castle. But when Princess Cadance took over the Crystal Empire, we sent it here for her to watch over.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: [sigh] I had always hoped that Sunset Shimmer would someday use it to return, to come back to Equestria seeking my guidance. Obviously, this is not what has happened.

speaker: Princess Cadance
text: Twilight, you must use the mirror to go into this other world and retrieve your crown. Without it, the other Elements of Harmony have no power and Equestria is left without one of its most important means of defense.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Your crown does not belong in the place Sunset Shimmer now calls home. And in her possession, your Element of Harmony will no doubt be used to bring harm to the inhabitants of this other realm. They will not have the power to defend themselves.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: You understand the importance of your task?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of course.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Good. Then you must go at once.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa, whoa, whoa! She's going, we're going with her.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Right, girls?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oooh! I'm so 'nervicited'!

speaker: Applejack
text: You *do* realize that's not a real word, right?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I'm afraid I can't let you go.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What?! Why not?!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Sending all of you could upset the balance of this alternate world, creating havoc that would make it impossible for Twilight to get the crown back from Sunset Shimmer. This is something Princess Twilight must do alone.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Time is of the essence. On the third day, when the moon reaches its peak in the night sky, the gateway will close. And once it does, it will be another thirty moons before you will be able to use it to return.

speaker: Rest of main cast
text: [remarks of encouragement] Spike, NO!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Whoa! Aaaah!

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh? Spike! You're not supposed to– Spike? Are you a... dog?

speaker: Spike
text: I... think so. But I have no idea what *you* are!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh? [screams] [panting]

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, you have to get it together!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [heavy breathing] [sigh] What... does the rest of me look like?

speaker: Spike
text: Um, like you. Only not you. Your muzzle's really small.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: My muzzle?! [panics]

speaker: Spike
text: Are you gonna scream again? Where are we?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know. But that must serve as the gateway back to Equestria. We need to find my crown as soon as possible and get back there. I suggest we start searching the castle first.

speaker: Spike
text: Works for me. Yeah, I don't think that's how the new you is supposed to–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Whooaaa... Whoa! Ooh... [laughs nervously] C'mon, Spike. I do *not* wanna be like this for longer than I have to.

speaker: Spike
text: Well, look on the bright side. You don't have those pesky wings to worry about anymore.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hmm! [grunts] [gasps] My magic! It isn't working!

speaker: Spike
text: Makes sense. You don't exactly have your horn.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What?!

speaker: Spike
text: We really need to find you a mirror.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What do ya think, Spike? Other artifacts she's stolen from Equestria? [gasps] What am I?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh? Oof!

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Whoa. You okay?

speaker: Spike
text: I don't think this is a castle.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
I've never seen a place
That's quite like this
Everything is turned around
This crazy world is upside-down

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
Getting on my feet
It's the hand that I was dealt
But I don't have much time with them
Got to learn all that I can

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
They don't use any magic or fly with any wings
I don't get these funny clothes, skinny legs or tiny nose
Everything's confusing when it seems so new
But I look a little closer and it starts to feel familiar too

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text:
What a strange new world (what a strange new world)
I'm trying to make heads or tails of this strange new world (what a strange new world)
Sorting through the small details of this strange new world

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What a strange new world

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I'm really sorry. I-I just found it, and-and I thought I should give it to her. I didn't know *you* had dropped it.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Well, I *did*! And I was about to get it before you swooped in and *ruined* everything! You shouldn't pick up things that don't belong to you.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [hushed] It... doesn't really belong to you, either.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Excuse me?!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: N-n-nothing...

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: That's what I thought. It's as good as mine, and you know it. You really *are* pathetic. It's no wonder your best friends are all stray animals.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How *dare* you speak to her that way!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: What did you say?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I said, "How dare you speak to her that way!"

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: You must be new here. I can speak to anyone any way I want.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I can't believe you did that!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I couldn't just stand there.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, it's just that *nobody* ever stands up to Sunset Shimmer.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sunset Shimmer!?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You've heard of her?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sort of...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't think I've seen you around before. Did you just transfer to Canterlot High from another school?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um... yes! Another... heh, school! My name's Twilight.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [very quietly] I'm... Fluttershy.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sorry, what was that?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [even quieter] It's Fluttershy!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It sounds like you're saying Fluttershy, but how can that...?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, my goodness! Who's this sweet little guy?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's Spike! My, uh... dog!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, he's so cute! Go on, eat up, little pup!

speaker: Spike
text: [eats] Huh?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, wouldn't ya just give anything to know what they're really thinking?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: He usually just tells me.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, w-what do you mean?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, uh, nothing! (chuckles) Never mind. Sunset Shimmer said you picked something up. Something that belonged to *her*. It wasn't a crown, was it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: How did you know?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, lucky guess? Do you still have it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Mm-mm.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But you know what happened to it.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Mm-hmm. This morning, I was passing out flyers for the animal shelter like I do every Wednesday.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Canterlot's animal shelter needs more volunteers. Won't you help an animal that can't help itself?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Ow!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I have no idea how it got there. But I didn't want anything to happen to it, so I decided to give it to Principal Celestia.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *Principal* Celestia? She's the ruler here?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You could say that. Technically, I guess she and Vice Principal Luna *do* make the rules.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Where is she now?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Probably in her office. Third door on your left.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thank you!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, wait! You're not really supposed to have pets on school grounds. Might wanna tuck him into your backpack. That's what I do.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: They just get so lonely when I'm in school all day.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, okay! Thank you!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no! I'm late for class!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Come in. How may I help you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, uh... Whew. My name's Twilight Sparkle. I-I'm new here, and... Well, I understand that Fluttershy found a crown this morning and gave it to you.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Yes. I've had Vice Principal Luna put it somewhere for safekeeping. No idea how it ended up in the front lawn. Were you interested in running for Princess of the Fall Formal this year?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, no. Not exactly. The truth is... Well, the truth is I... You see, the crown is actually... Princess of the Fall Formal?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: It's Canterlot High's big Fall dance.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Like the Grand Galloping Gala.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Uh, Grand Galloping Gala?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, uh, it was a big deal at my old school.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: And was there a princess?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, but she wasn't exactly a student.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Here at Canterlot High, the students select one of their peers to represent them. She receives a crown at the Fall Formal.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hmm. You asked me if I was interested in running for Princess. Can anyone run?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Yes. You just need to let the head of the Fall Formal planning committee know you'd like to be on the ballot. Was there anything else?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, nope! That was it!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Well, if you do need anything else, my door is always open.

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, why didn't ya just tell her the crown was yours and ask for it back?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh, I was going to, but imagine if one of *them* showed up in Equestria saying they came from a place filled with tall, fleshy, two-legged creatures with *these*? We'd think they were crazy!

speaker: Spike
text: Hmm. You make a good point.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Looks like if I want my crown back, I'll have to become Princess of the Canterlot High Fall Formal. So that's what I'm gonna do!

speaker: Spike
text: And how exactly do you plan on doing that?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I have no idea!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know we've just met, but I was wondering if you might be able to help me with something.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Of course!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I've decided to run for Princess of the Fall Formal, and–

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [gasp] Oh! Oh, gosh! Sorry. It's just, oh, running for Fall Formal Princess is a *really* bad idea.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Sunset Shimmer wants to be Fall Formal Princess, and when she wants something, she gets it! She'll make life awful for anyone who stands in her way. Just ask the girl who ran against her for Princess of the Spring Fling.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I have to try!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I don't think you understand. You'd have to convince *everyone* here to vote for you instead of her: the athletes, the fashionistas, the dramas, the eco-kids, the techies, the rockers...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why is everypony–

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, every*body* separated this way?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Maybe it was different at your old school, but at C.H.S., everybody sticks to their own kind. One thing that they *do* have in common is that they know Sunset Shimmer is gonna rule the school until we graduate.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not if I can help it! [chews apple] So, uh, [giggle] where would I find the head of the party planning committee?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy said she'd probably be in here.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Incoming! [breathes in and blows into a balloon]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hi, my name's Twilight Sparkle and... Pinkie Pie?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasps] Are you psychic?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, no. I don't think so. Unless of course that's something you can do here.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sigh] Not usually.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy said this is where I'd find the head of the Fall Formal planning committee.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Fluttershy, huh? Don't let the whole "shy" thing fool you. She can be a real meanie.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You two aren't friends?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Waited a bit to get your name on the ballot, huh? Dance is day after tomorrow.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm brand new here.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oooh! I thought you didn't look familiar. Though, now that I'm really lookin' at you... Do you have a twin sister who lives in the city, has a pet dog named Spike that looks just like that one?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, maybe?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Thought so. Anyhoo, just need to fill this out and you are officially up for the coveted Princess of the Fall Formal crown.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wow! You have *really* bad handwriting. It's like you've never held a pen before.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [nervous laughter] Is it?

speaker: Applejack
text: Somebody order a dozen cases of fizzy apple cider?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh! Oh! Me, me-me-me, me, yeah, ha-ha, me!

speaker: Applejack
text: Can you bring in the rest?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hey, I know you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You do?

speaker: Applejack
text: Sure. You're the new girl who gave Sunset Shimmer the what for today. [gulps cider]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Twilight Sparkle here is gonna run against Sunset Shimmer for Princess of the Fall Formal.

speaker: Applejack
text: [spits] I'd think twice about *that*. Oh, sure, she'll probably approach you all friendly like... [fakes Sunset Shimmer's voice] I sure am lookin' forward to some friendly competition. [fakes Twilight's voice] That's so good to hear. [normal] But then, here comes the backstabbin'.

speaker: Applejack
text: About the only girl in this school you can trust less than Sunset Shimmer is Rainbow Dash.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: She's the captain of, like, *every* team at Canterlot High.

speaker: Applejack
text: She's also the captain of sayin' she's gonna do somethin' for ya, and then turnin' around and not even botherin' to show up.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thanks for the advice, Applejack, but this is something I *really* need to do.

speaker: Applejack
text: Huh, suit yourself. Hey, how'd you know my name is Applejack?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Um, I uh... [nervous laughter] Didn't you say?

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Nnnope.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, it sure was nice meeting you both. I'm sure I'll be seeing you around.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That one's tryin' to hide a secret, but I am totally on to her. [whispering] She's psychic!

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh-huh. If you say so.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: This looks terrible! There should be more streamers near the stage and fewer balloons.

speaker: Snips
text: Yeah, streamers!

speaker: Snails
text: And fewer balloons!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Fizzy apple cider? Ugh! This is my coronation, not a hoedown.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, now, it ain't necessarily gonna be *your* coronation this time around.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Oh, is that so? You country folk really aren't that bright. Must be why the other students say such awful things about you.

speaker: Applejack
text: Grrr...

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Obviously it's gonna be *my* coronation. I'm running unopposed.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Not this time. The new girl just signed up!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: What?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I know. Her handwriting is really bad.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [to herself] Where is this Twilight Sparkle? [laughs] [to Applejack and Pinkie Pie] I'm looking forward to meeting the competition!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Can't believe I didn't recognize you earlier. Shoulda known Princess Celestia would send her prized pupil here after my crown, and her little dog, too.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's *my* crown!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Whatever. This is just a minor setback for me. You don't know the first thing about this place, and *I* already rule it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If that's so, why do you even *need* my crown? You went to an awful lot of trouble to switch it with the one that belongs here.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Pop quiz: what happens when you bring an Element of Harmony into an alternate world? You don't know? *Seriously*? [laughing] And *you're* supposed to be Princess Celestia's star student? Then again, what were the chances she'd find somepony as bright as *me* to take under her wing after *I* decided to leave Equestria? Bit embarrassing that you were the best she could do.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Oh, and I'd keep an eye on your mutt. Hate for him to be... taken away from you.

speaker: Spike
text: Is that a threat?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Oh, of course not.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: But I'd cut down on the chatter if I were you. Don't want everyone to know you don't belong here, now would you? You wanna be a princess here? Please. You don't know the first thing about fitting in.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I want you to follow her. Bring me something I can use just like I did with that last girl who thought she could challenge me.

speaker: Snips
text: You got it, Sunset Shimmer.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: When the crown and its power are mine, Twilight Sparkle will be sorry she ever set hoof into *this* world. Not that she would've been much safer if she'd stayed in Equestria.

speaker: Snips
text: Yeah, in Equestria.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: What are you still doing here?! Go!

speaker: Snips
Snails
text: Ow. Oh.

speaker: Trixie
text: Excuse me. The Great and Powerful Trixie! ...Needs some peanut butter crackers.

speaker: Trixie
text: Voilà!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Sunset Shimmer is right. I don't know the first thing about this place. If I'm gonna really fit in and win votes, we need to do some research.

speaker: Spike
text: Research?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This place has a school. I have to believe it's got a... library!

speaker: Snips
text: Got your phone?

speaker: Snails
text: Got yours?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So I just push the letters here, and then the words and moving pictures will come up *here*?

speaker: Cheerilee
text: [sigh] That's right.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe this place *does* have magic.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [in video] "When you're a younger–"

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Uh, girls, what are you doing?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: We're just seeing how many hits our new music video has gotten.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [in video] "So the three of us will fight the fight..."

speaker: Cheerilee
text: [groaning] No, just...

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [in video] "There is nothing–"

speaker: Cheerilee
text: No! The school computers are for research purposes only.

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: It's just as well, y'all. Some of the comments about our song were really awful. "Epic fail"... "Funniest thing I've ever seen"?!

speaker: Sweetie Belle
text: Funniest thing they've ever seen, huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, I don't know that *that's* what you should take from... [sounds of exertion]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Whoa! *Whoa*! Waah!

speaker: Cheerilee
text: Shhh!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh... [nervous laughter]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ugh.

speaker: Voice on PA system
text: The library will be closing in five minutes.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [yawn] [gasp] I hadn't even thought about where we're gonna sleep tonight!

speaker: Spike
text: Way ahead of you.

speaker: Spike
text: It's a little [cough, cough] dusty. But it doesn't seem like anybody comes up here.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's perfect, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: So, how did your research go?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I found this book. It's called a yearbook. It seems to be something they use to keep a record of things that have happened at the school. Look. That's Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash, Applejack, Fluttershy, and I'm gonna bet the girl on the far right is Rarity.

speaker: Spike
text: There's a Rarity here!? Uh, I mean, uh... interesting photo.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's interesting because they look like they're friends.

speaker: Spike
text: They *do* look like our friends. But I thought we'd figured that out already.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, I mean... they look like they're friends with each other. But it doesn't seem like they're friends now.

speaker: Spike
text: Not so much.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I just can't help but get the feeling that Sunset Shimmer had something to do with it.

speaker: Spike
text: I wouldn't put it past her. But she wanted your crown 'cause she's planning on doing something even worse! If you're gonna stop her, you have to focus on *making* friends here. Can't worry about why *these* girls aren't friends anymore. Even if they [yawning] *do* remind you of your Ponyville friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You're right, Spike. [sigh] Eye on the prize.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: [on P.A. system] Good morning, students, and happy Thursday. Just a reminder to pick up your ballots for the Princess of the Fall Formal today. They are due at the time the dance starts tomorrow night, so don't forget to turn them in and make your voice heard.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Fluttershy said I'd need to win over all those different groups if I wanna become Princess of the Fall Formal. So I've compiled a list of talking points.

speaker: Spike
text: [laughing] You made a list? That's so unlike you! [laughs nervously] Uh... Please... Continue.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'll start introducing myself, sprinkle in some things I learned about their world into the conversation, show them how I fit in here! [sigh] Okay, Spike. Time to make a good first impression on my fellow students. The whole world sorta depends on it.

speaker: Nolan North
text: Hey, look.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why is everybody looking at me funny? Whoa! What're you...? Why did you...? Rarity?

speaker: Rarity
text: Perfect! Oh, yes. This is good! No one will recognize you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why wouldn't I wanna be–

speaker: Rarity
text: *And* we'll need a disguise for your dog, which is too bad. He really is *so adorable*! Y'know, with a little work, I think I could make him look like a rabbit instead.

speaker: Spike
text: Huh?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: A rabbit?

speaker: Applejack
text: There you are, Twilight.

speaker: Rarity
text: So much for the disguise.

speaker: Applejack
text: I've been lookin' all over for ya!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Me too.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Me three! I like your new look!

speaker: Rarity
text: I *do* have an eye for these sorts of things. Not that *you* seem to care.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why do you think she doesn't care? No, never mind. Why were you all looking for me? What's going on?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, she hasn't seen it yet.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Seen what?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, it's really not that bad. [laughing nervously]

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [in video] Twilight Sparkle wants to be *your* Fall Formal Princess. But what does it say about *our* school if we give someone like *this*... such an important honor?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wha... I...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I take that back. It's pretty bad!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But this all happened yesterday! At the library! Has everyone in the school seen this? Is that why they were all looking at me that way?

speaker: Applejack
Pinkie Pie
text: Mmm...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What am I gonna do? No one is gonna vote for me after seeing *this*!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Not that it'll make any difference, but I'll still vote for you.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You were so nice to stand up for me when Sunset Shimmer was picking on me yesterday.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: If ya still wanna run, maybe there's something *I* can do to help!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Word of advice? Don't accept *her* help. She doesn't take anything seriously!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ugh! Why do you have to be so awful to me?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! Pff. Kch. Ts! Don't play innocent, Pinkie Pie! You are no better than *she* is!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And what is *that* supposed to mean?!

speaker: Rarity
text: [to Twilight] *I* am happy to offer up my assistance as well. [to Pinkie] To someone who would appreciate what I have to offer!

speaker: Applejack
text: Listen to y'all carryin' on! Get over it and move on!

speaker: Rarity
text: You mean like how *you've* gotten over what happened with Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Applejack
text: She said she'd get the softball team to make an appearance at my bake sale. I tell everybody they're comin', and then not one of 'em shows up! She made a liar outta me! That's different!

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Is not!

speaker: Applejack
text: Is too!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: STOP! All of you! I wanna show you something. You were friends once.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hmm. The Freshman Fair. Y'all remember?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But something happened. I think that something was Sunset Shimmer.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, it's a nice theory, darling, but Sunset Shimmer had nothing to do with it.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: She's right. Sunset Shimmer isn't the one who ruined my silent auction for the animal shelter by bringing fireworks and noisemakers! It was supposed to be a serious event, and Pinkie Pie ruined it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What are you talking about? I got a text from you saying that you didn't want a silent auction. You wanted a big party!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uh! I never sent you a text!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You didn't?

speaker: Rarity
text: You don't think she's the one who's been sending me those e-mails, do you? Every time I volunteer to help with the decorations at a school function, I get an e-mail from Pinkie Pie saying she has plenty of volunteers! And *then* I find out she's done everything herself.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I never sent you any e-mails!

speaker: Applejack
text: Maybe *she's* the reason Rainbow Dash didn't show up for my bake sale!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Didn't you ever ask Rainbow Dash why she didn't show up?

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh, I guess I kinda stopped talkin' to her at *all* after that.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe now would be a good time to start.

speaker: Rarity
text: They're actually talking! That's a good sign!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hugs! Ooh, hugs are always good!

speaker: Applejack
text: *Somebody*, and I think we can all guess who, told Rainbow Dash that my bake sale had been moved to a different day. Dash showed up with all the softball team and thought *I'd* cancelled on *her*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So you're lookin' to dethrone Sunset Shimmer and become Princess of the Fall Formal, huh? Gotta say, I'd *really* love to see that happen. I'll *totally* help you out! All you gotta do is beat me in a game of one-on-one.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: First to five goals wins. One-zip!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's game!

speaker: Rarity
text: I... really thought you were gonna... pull it off there in the end! [laughs nervously]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So what's the plan? How can I help *you* be princess instead of Sunset Shimmer?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But... I... lost!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Of course you lost. I'm awesome! But I'm not gonna help just *anybody* try and beat Sunset Shimmer. The Fall Formal Princess should be someone with heart *and* determination. You've proved that you've got 'em both!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And... can I get mine with extra oats?

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: Oats?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, scratch that. However you normally make it is fine.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Oh! We've got to stop bumping into each other like this.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You know me! Always trying to make a big *splash* around here. 'Cause my drink kinda splashed... on the ground! [nervous laughter] I'm gonna go over there now.

speaker: Rarity
text: Don't even think about it! You're already trying to get her crown. Who *knows* what Sunset Shimmer would do if you ended up getting her ex-boyfriend too?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm not trying to. I don't even know... We just accidentally... Ex-boyfriend?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Flash Sentry broke up with her a few weeks ago. I can't believe she hasn't done something awful to him yet.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe she's just waiting until she has the power to do something *really* awful.

speaker: Applejack
text: All right, girls. Dance is tomorrow night, and we still don't know how we're gonna get Twilight the votes she needs to be named princess. Right now, folks only know the Twilight from the videos Sunset Shimmer posted online. We need to help 'em see her differently.

speaker: Rarity
text: I'VE GOT IT! Ahem. I mean, um, perhaps I have a solution. Now this may be an absolutely preposterous idea, but what if we all wore *these* as a sign of unity? Freshman year, they were very, very popular. A way for everybody to show their school spirit! You know? "Go, Canterlot Wondercolts!" Ahem. I haven't sold any in ages. I mean, the five of us are obviously very different, but deep down, we're all Canterlot Wondercolts! Sunset Shimmer is the one who divided us, Twilight Sparkle is the one who united us. And we're gonna let everyone know it! What do you think?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Take those off! I have something I need you to do.

speaker: Rarity
text: Doesn't everyone look just fabulous?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It was a great idea, Rarity!

speaker: Applejack
text: Don't know what *she's* smilin' about. Twilight's the one that's gonna be Princess of the Fall Formal.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Vice Principal Luna! Something terrible has happened!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Isn't this just awful? And after Pinkie Pie worked so hard to make things so perfect! Why would Twilight Sparkle do something like this?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Why would you think Twilight was responsible for something like this?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Because I have proof.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But... But I don't understand!

speaker: Princess Luna
text: This is clearly you in the photographs, is it not?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, but...

speaker: Princess Luna
text: I think it should be fairly obvious that the school *cannot* let someone who would do something like *this* compete for the Fall Formal crown.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Vice Principal Luna. I found these in a trash can in the library. Thought you should see them. Someone obviously combined these photos to make it *look* like Twilight was the one who trashed the gym.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: I appreciate you bringing these to my attention, Flash. In light of this new evidence, you may of course continue your bid to be crowned the Princess of the Fall Formal.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Thank you! You have no idea how important this is to me!

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: (chuckles) What was I gonna do? Not prove your innocence? Wouldn't be much of a Canterlot Wondercolt, would I?

speaker: Princess Luna
text: I am afraid enough damage has been done to the gym that we will have to postpone the dance until tomorrow night. If you will excuse me, I need to let my sister know about this latest development.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: So, uh, I was wondering. If you aren't already going with somebody, wanna go to the Fall Formal with me tomorrow night?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That would be... Tomorrow night!? No, no-no-no-no-no, no no no no no! Nonononono! I can't! The portal! That'll be too late! [panting]

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: One "no" would have been fine!

speaker: Rarity
text: Everything okay in there?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes! [to herself] Only it's not okay. It's not okay at all! If I don't get my crown tonight, I won't be able to go back to Equestria for another thirty moons! Oh, what are we gonna do?

speaker: Spike
text: Hmm. We tell them the truth. Let them know what's really at stake if you don't get the crown tonight. They'll help us figure somethin' out.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But what if they *won't*? What if when they find out how different I really am...?

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight, these girls rallied around you 'cause they saw what was in your heart. They aren't gonna feel any differently about you when they find out you're a pony princess in Equestria.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm glad you followed me here, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: Me too. Unless, of course, we get stuck here for another thirty moons.

speaker: Applejack
text: You okay?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The Fall Formal isn't happening tonight.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: WHAT!?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It had to be postponed because Sunset Shimmer had Snips and Snails ruin all of Pinkie Pie's decorations.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *WHAT?!?*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But the Fall Formal *has* to happen tonight.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wha–!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sigh] You see...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You're from an alternate world and you're a pony princess there and the crown *actually* has a magical element embedded in it that helps power up other magical elements, and without it they don't work anymore, and you need them all to help protect your magical world, and if you don't get the crown tonight, you'll be stuck in *this* world and you won't be able to get back for, like, a really, really long time! [squee]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, I'm pretty sure that *isn't* the reason.

speaker: Spike
text: Nope, she's pretty much spot-on.

speaker: Rarity
text: He can talk!?

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, yeah! And back where I come from, I'm not even a dog! I'm a ferocious, fire-breathing dragon!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: This is so amazing! Tell me, what are you thinking right now?

speaker: Spike
text: Sure would love a scratch behind the old ears!

speaker: Rarity
text: Gah...

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, maybe later.

text: How did you *know* all that?

speaker: Pinkie Pie

text: You're from another world?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gulp] Mm-hmm.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Uh, Twilight! Look, I know you said "no" about going to the Fall Formal with me, but would you reconsider and at least have *one* dance?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I didn't say "no"! I mean, I did, but... I didn't *mean* no, to you. I was... Well, what I mean is... yes. I'd love to dance with you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Anybody see Sunset Shimmer?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Maybe she was too embarrassed to show! She's gotta know you won by a landslide!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe...

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: First off, I wanna say how wonderful everything looks tonight. You all did a magnificent job pulling things together after the *unfortunate* events of earlier. And now, without further ado, I'd like to announce the winner of this year's Fall Formal crown. The Princess of this year's Fall Formal is... Twilight Sparkle!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Congratulations, Twilight.

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight! Help!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: They've got Spike!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: That's close enough!

speaker: Spike
text: Twilight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't hurt him!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Oh, I wouldn't dream of it. I'm not a monster, Twilight. [to Snips and Snails] Let him go. [to Twilight] You don't belong here. Give me the crown, and you can go back to Equestria tonight. Or keep it and *never* go home.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Tick-tock, Twilight. We haven't got all night. The portal will be closing on its own in less than an hour. So, what's your answer?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *No*.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: What!? Equestria! Your friends! Lost to you forever! Don't you see what I'm about to do to the portal?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes, but I've also seen what you've been able to do here *without* magic. Equestria will find a way to survive without my Element of Harmony. This place might not, if I allow it to fall into *your* hands. So go ahead. Destroy the portal. You are *not* getting this crown!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Fine. You win.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You... are... so awesome!

speaker: Applejack
text: I can't believe you were gonna do that for us!

speaker: Rarity
text: It's no wonder you're a real live princess!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Oh, yes, she's so *very* special! [to Snips and Snails] Grab him, you fools!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Spike! Spike! Fluttershy!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I'll take that! [chuckles evilly] At last! More power than I could ever imagine!

speaker: Snips
text: This is gonna be so cool!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I've had to jump through so many hoops tonight just to get my hands on this crown, and it really should have been mine all along. [growls] But let's let bygones be bygones. *I* am your princess now, and you will be loyal... to *me*!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [to Snips and Snails] Round them up and bring them to the portal. [to Twilight and friends] Spoiler alert: I was bluffing when I said I was going to destroy the portal. I don't want to rule this pathetic little high school; I want Equestria! And with my own little teenage army behind me, I am going to get it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, you're not!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Oh, please! What exactly do you think you're going to do to stop me? I have magic, and you have *nothing*!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: She has *us*!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [growls, evil laughter] Gee, the gang really *is* all back together again. [evil laughter] Now step aside! Twilight has tried to interfere with my plans one too many times already! She needs to be dealt with! [evil laughter] What!?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The magic contained in my Element was able to unite with those that helped create it! [echoing] Honesty! Kindness! Laughter! Generosity! Loyalty! Magic! Together with a crown, they create a power beyond anything you could imagine, but it is a power you don't have the ability to control! The crown may be upon your head, Sunset Shimmer, but you cannot wield it, because you do not possess the most powerful magic of all: the magic of friendship!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: No! [screaming] What is happening?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Here *and* in Equestria, it is the only magic that can truly unite us all!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You will *never* rule in Equestria. Any power you may have had in this world is gone. Tonight, you've shown everyone who you really are. You've shown them what is in your heart.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [crying] I-I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. I didn't know there was another way.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: *The magic of friendship doesn't just exist in Equestria. It's everywhere. You can seek it out, or you can forever be alone. The choice is yours.*

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: But... But all I've ever done since being here is drive everyone apart. I don't know the first thing about friendship.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I bet *they* can teach you.

speaker: Spike
text: Those are my girls! Woo-hoo!

speaker: Brawly Beats
text: Did that dog just talk? Whoa. Weird.

speaker: Spike
text: *Seriously*? The talking dog is a weird thing about all this?

speaker: Rarity
text: I, for one, think you're adorable.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, yeah.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I believe this belongs to you. *A true princess in any world leads not by forcing others to bow before her, but by inspiring others to stand with her.* We have all seen that you are capable of just that. I hope you see it too, Princess Twilight.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I do.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Would *now* be a completely awkward time to ask you for that dance?

speaker: Rarity
text: [laughs] I still can't believe that happens when we play! Ooh! I've got to look into some new accessories! Something that looks good in a longer ponytail. Ooh! Maybe some clip-on earrings for when I get those adorable pony ears.

speaker: Applejack
text: I just wonder *why* it happens. Princess Twilight took her crown back to Equestria. Shouldn't that mean she took all the magic back with her?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who cares why it happens? It makes my band totally awesome!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! *Your* band?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Duh! It was my idea to start the Rainbooms so we could be in the showcase. Plus I'm the lead singer and guitarist.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Uh, heard you outside. You guys are sounding really tight.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, we're getting there. Rarity's still coming in a little late on the second verse, and Applejack's bass solo could use a little work. They'll get it together in time for the showcase.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Uh, I don't suppose any of our friends from, uh... out of town might come? Uh, it being a special charity event and all.

speaker: Applejack
text: Sorry, Flash. I don't think Twilight's gonna be back at Canterlot High any time soon.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: [laughs nervously] Oh, yeah. Okay. I just, you know, thought I'd ask. Uh, k-keep on rockin' it.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well. [giggles] Someone is quite the smitten kitten. [to Sunset Shimmer] Oh. Sorry. I always forget you and Flash used to be an item.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: It's okay. Flash is a great guy and all, but I never really *liked-him* liked him. I was just using him to become more popular. Ugh! The old me really was just awful, wasn't she?

speaker: Rarity
text: Mmm... horrid.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
text: Mm-hmm, uhhh, etc.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yep!

speaker: Applejack
text: But the important thing is that you've turned yourself around.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Thanks, Applejack, but I'm not sure everyone else at CHS feels the same way.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Sunset Shimmer, please report to the main foyer.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Gotta run. I volunteered to show some new students around the school. Thought it'd be good for them to get to know the new me before they heard all the stuff about the old me.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We've still got a few minutes before lunch starts. What do you say we do "Awesome As I Wanna Be"?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, Rainbow Dash? I was wondering if we could maybe play the song I wrote?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We'll get to it.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh. Okay.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Hi. Are you the girls I'm supposed to show around?

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: We are.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Canterlot High is a great school. You're really gonna love it.

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: Oh, yes, we really sense there's something... magical about this place.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: That's the science lab. Computer lab is in there. Oh! We're having a big musical showcase this weekend! The whole school is pretty much rallying around it.

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: [gasps] A *musical* showcase?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I'm sure since you're new, Principal Celestia would let you sign up if you're interested.

speaker: Aria Blaze
text: We have been known to sing from time to time.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: Hello? We sing, like, all the time! It's how we get people to do what we want.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: Wha-What did I say?

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: What you *meant* to say was that being in a musical showcase sounds like a great way to meet other students.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: Ohhhh, yeah. Th-What she said I meant to say. That's what I meant. To say.

speaker: Aria Blaze
text: [scoffs] And what you *would* have said if you weren't the worst.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: *You* are!

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: You'll have to excuse them. They're idiots.

speaker: Aria Blaze
Sonata Dusk
text: Hmph.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [nervous laugh] Those are pretty. Where did you—

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: [laughs] Sorry. These pendants mean an awful lot to us. We'd just hate for anything to happen to them.

speaker: Applejack
text: So how was the tour?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I don't know. I mean, these girls, they were... There was something off about them.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Like, off like this? Or off like this? Or... Oh, oh! Like—

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Maybe we should just let her tell us.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: That's just it. I can't put my finger on it. They just acted sort of... strange around me. Maybe someone already talked to them. Told them about what I did. [sighs] So much for making a good first impression.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Uh-huh. Oh, that's probably not it.

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: This is it, girls. The moment we've been waiting for.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: Lunch?!

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: [groan] The chance to get our true Equestrian magic back.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: Oh. Right.

text: Our voices are just strong enough to make them want something so badly, they'll fight to get it.

text: So we're just gonna do what we always do? Stir up some trouble and then feed off the negative energy? [sarcastically] Some plan, Adagio.

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: It won't be the same as the times before! There is Equestrian magic here. Their negative energy will give us the power we need to get this entire world to do our bidding.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: But we can get lunch after though, right? It's Taco Tuesday!

text: Just follow my lead.

text: Or my lead.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ohhhh. They're *that* kind of "off".

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Those three are definitely in possession of some kind of dark magic. How else could you explain what happened back there?

speaker: Applejack
text: Don't worry, y'all. We'll let Principal Celestia know all about this and those girls will be kicked to the curb in no time. Last thing she needs is another CHS event almost ruined by some power-crazed lunatic. [to Sunset] Er, no offense.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [sighs] None taken.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Dark magic? I find that very hard to believe. Those girls came into my office earlier and were absolutely delightful.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Ugh! Perhaps Sunset Shimmer is just eager to make someone else out to be a bad element, so that her actions at the Fall Formal will become old news.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I could see why you might think that, but—

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's *not* what's happening! We saw all of this go down in the cafeteria too!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Yes, but isn't your band supposed to be part of the Musical Showcase?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Perhaps you're all just worried that the Dazzlings will steal your spotlight.

speaker: Applejack
text: The "Dazzlings"?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: It's the name of their musical group. That's why they came by my office earlier today – to sign up for the Showcase. Even sang a little song to Vice Principal Luna and I.

speaker: Applejack
text: They did?

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Yes. And we think having a Battle of the Bands instead is a marvelous idea.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I can't believe they got to Principal Celestia and Vice Principal Luna too.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: They've gotten to everybody.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Not everybody!

speaker: Applejack
text: Pinkie Pie's right. We were there when the Dazzlings were singin' and we weren't affected. It was like we were protected somehow.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So let's take them down! It's not like we haven't tangled with dark magic before and totally whooped its sorry butt! Uh, no offense.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [sighs] None taken. Again.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: But that was when Twilight was here. There may be some kind of magic inside us, but it only comes out when we play music. I sure don't know how to use it to... whoop anybody's butt.

speaker: Rarity
text: [sighs] If only we could get a message to Twilight. Maybe she could tell us how to break the spell the Dazzlings have cast on our friends.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, *that's* not gonna happen. The portal's closed.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And I get the feeling they don't exactly have cell phones where she's from.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I may have an idea how we can get in touch with Princess Twilight!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: When I was Princess Celestia's student back in Equestria, she gave me this. Even after I abandoned my studies, I held onto it. Deep down, I guess I knew I was making a big mistake, and I wanted to still have a way to reach out to her. Maybe it still works.

speaker: Rarity
text: That's a *book*, darling. What do you mean, "maybe still works"?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: It used to be that if I wrote something here, it would appear in the pages of a book back in Princess Celestia's library. I get a message to *her*, then *she* can get a message to Princess Twilight.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So what are you waiting for? Get to writing!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [sighs] Been a long time since I've written *these* words. "Dear Princess Celestia..."

speaker: Delivery Pony
text: Excuse me, Princess. Where do you want all these books from Princess Celestia?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The library. Third door on the left.

speaker: Delivery Pony
text: Even this one that's glowin' and vibratin'?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What is it, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It looks like a message to Princess Celestia from my friends at Canterlot High.

speaker: Rarity
text: How is that even possible?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I have no idea, but it... sounds like they need my help.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The way Sunset Shimmer described them, I think these new girls sound an awful lot like... the sirens.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Not the sirens! [whispering loudly to Fluttershy] I don't actually know what that is!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The sirens were three beautiful but dangerous creatures who had the power to charm ponies with their music. But to maintain this power, they had to feed on the negativity and distrust of others. The more of this negative energy they consumed, the stronger their voices became, and the farther they could spread their dark magic.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I don't think I like this story very much.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: If the sirens had their way, they would have divided and conquered all of Equestria. But a certain Star Swirl the Bearded wasn't having it. Rumor has it he found a way to banish them to another world – one where he believed their magic power would be lost. That world must have been the one where my Canterlot High friends live.

speaker: Applejack
text: But Star Swirl must have sent them there ages ago. How come they're just surfacin' now?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't know. But if my hunch is right and it *is* the sirens who have come to Canterlot High, this spell they've cast is just the beginning. My friends need me. I have to get back to them.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I hate to burst your bubble, Twilight, but the connection between their world and Equestria will still be totally cut off for a super long time.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Okay, first of all, if there was bubble-blowing going on, why wasn't I told about it?! And secondly, if the connection is totally cut off, how was Sunset Shimmer able to get a message to Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [gasps] Pinkie, you're a genius!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah, I get that a lot. [to Rainbow Dash] Now about those bubbles...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: ...And the interval between the two points is defined as the square root of the sum of the squares of the separation between the points along three spatial dimensions.

speaker: Spike
text: Say what now?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Duh! She's gonna take the magic in here and put it in there. That'll make the portal open up so that whenever she wants to, she can go from here to there. There to here. Here to there. Here there! Here there! Here—

speaker: Applejack
text: We get the idea!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now to see if it actually works.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
Applejack
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: Ooooh...

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
Applejack
Rarity
Twilight Sparkle
text: Ahhhhh...

speaker: Applejack
text: Don't suppose we could join you this time around?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Better not. It could make things pretty confusing if Canterlot High all of a sudden had *two* of all of you.

speaker: Spike
text: But *I* still get to go, right? There isn't another one of *me* at Canterlot High. And you never know if you might need your trusty assistant.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Mm-hmm.

speaker: Spike
text: Yes!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We won't be gone long.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, you be careful, Twilight.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Take care!

speaker: Applejack
text: Y'all be safe now.

speaker: Rarity
text: And don't forget to dress well.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ready, Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: [cracks knuckles] [blows] [squeaks claws] Ready!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] I'm starting to think she's not coming.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Pinkie Pie
Applejack
Rarity
Sunset Shimmer
text: Twilight!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oof. I'm back.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And I've got some bad news about those new girls.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, I do hate that you had to return at a time of crisis. There's so much catching up to do!

speaker: Applejack
text: For starters, a certain blue-haired guitar player was just askin' about you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [excitedly] Flash Sentry was asking about me?! [clears throat] Isn't that nice? [sips milkshake]

speaker: Rarity
text: Perhaps you would give us just the slightest bit of gossip from your world?

speaker: Spike
text: She's got an official title now. [imitates fanfare] The Princess of Friendship!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Wow, that's really impressive. Guess you really *were* Princess Celestia's prized pupil.

speaker: Spike
text: She's even got her own castle!

speaker: Rarity
text: A castle?! You have your own castle?!? Eh... [clears throat] Ooh, uh, lovely.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What's new here? I mean, besides your school becoming the target of dangerous magical creatures from Equestria?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, so, that isn't exactly the *only* strange thing that's happened since you left. Pretty sweet, huh? It happens to all of us when we play.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hmm. My crown was returned to Equestria, but some of its magic must have remained here at Canterlot High. Now that we're all back together, we can use that magic on the sirens. Just like when we were able to use it on Sunset Shimmer when she turned into that horrifyingly awful winged monster! No offense.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [disgruntled] None taken. Heh. I'm used to it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: They'll never even know what hit 'em! [karate yells]

speaker: Applejack
text: We've got nothin' to worry about now that Twilight's back.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I'm pretty sure *I* could find something to worry about. But it won't be the sirens.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The sooner we do this, the better. Any idea where the Dazzlings might be?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sips milkshake] [sighs] There's a big party tonight for all the bands who signed up to be in the showcase! That would include the Dazzlings.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Looks like we've got a party to crash.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: [sighs] I'm gonna get more punch!

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Eh, bumped, into, always, doing?

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: What are you doing here? You came back for the big competition, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Something like that.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Huh. Not that there's gonna be any *real* competition. No one here wants this as bad as *my* band does!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Can you excuse me for just a minute?

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: [mock surprise] Oh, no! No one's mingling! It's like there's some kind of underlying tension that could bubble to the surface at any minute!

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: It's the fruit punch, isn't it? I *knew* I used too much grape juice!

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: It's *not* the fruit punch! It's us!

speaker: Aria Blaze
text: But the punch is awful, too.

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: What do *you* know about good fruit punch?

speaker: Aria Blaze
text: More than you!

speaker: Sonata Dusk
text: Do not!

speaker: Aria Blaze
text: Do too!

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: This is just the kickoff party, girls. Imagine what a tizzy they'll be in by the time the Battle of the Bands starts.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There isn't going to be a Battle of the Bands! We're gonna make sure of that! Alright, girls, let's do this! Friendship is magic!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, weren't there rainbows and lasers and stuff last time?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I don't understand. We're all together again. Why isn't this working?

speaker: Spike
text: You, uh... really need to go ahead and do that whole "magic of friendship" thing now.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm trying, Spike. I thought the six of us standing together against the sirens would bring out the magic we needed to defeat them. That's what happened before.

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: Talk about throwing down the gauntlet! This group is obviously serious about winning! A little cocky though, aren't they? Claiming there won't really be a battle. Seems they think they've already got this thing all locked up.

speaker: Trixie
text: Not if the Great and Powerful Trrrrrixie has anything to do with it!

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: Whatever, Trixie! We're the best band at CHS!

speaker: Apple Bloom
text: No! The Crusaders are gonna win!

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: I think we may have found what we're looking for. Or rather, it found us.

speaker: Adagio Dazzle
text: Magic!! Don't you see?! Everyone else has fallen under our spell. But not *these* girls. These girls are special.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It doesn't make any sense. I should have been able to create the spark that would help us break their spell. That's how it worked before.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: But to defeat me, you drew magic from the crown I was wearing. The sirens' magic comes from their music. So maybe *you* have to use the same kind of magic to defeat *them*. Or... maybe not.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No. I think you're onto something.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Really?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's when you play music that you transform now, right?

speaker: Applejack
text: Yup. Ears, tails, the whole shebang.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So maybe the way to use that magic to defeat the sirens is by playing a musical counter-spell!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You mean like a song?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh-huh. And in order to free everyone who's been exposed to the sirens' spell, we'll need them all to hear it.

speaker: Rest of main cast
text: Hmmm...

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] The band competition! That's the next time we can be certain everyone will be in the same place at the same time.

speaker: Applejack
text: Guess the Rainbooms *are* the band to beat.

speaker: Rarity
text: And I believe *you*, Twilight, just became the Rainbooms' newest member.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So what do you wanna play? Triangle? [ding] Sousaphone? [fwomp!] Theremin? [plays theremin] Soooo magical.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I might take a little too long to learn how to play something with these. I'll just sing.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Like, as in, *lead* singer? Cuz that's usually *my* gig. This being my band and all.

speaker: Applejack
text: It's *our* band! And, of course, as lead singer. She's the one with the magical know-how to help us pull this thing off.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, yeah, that's cool. I'll just use this as a chance to hone my already insanely good lead guitar skills.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: It's only temporary. And we don't have to win the Battle of the Bands. We just have to perform during the first round of the competition.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Let's get to learning that musical counter-spell!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, that's just it. I don't *know* any.

speaker: Rest of main cast
text: Awww...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But I'm sure I could figure out how to *write* one.

speaker: Spike
text: Totally! Twilight can write a spell like it's *no*body's business. That's pretty much how she got to become a princess in Equestria.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Technically, I helped *finish* a spell. And there was a little more to it than that, Spike.

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah, whatever.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I've got this. [to Spike] C'mon!

text: I just don't understand why there's this big rivalry. Aren't the "Friendship Games" supposed to be about our two schools getting along?

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, it's kinda hard to get along with someone who beats you at everything.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Not anymore! This time, things are gonna be different.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: What do you mean?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, you'll find out.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: As I am sure you all know, tomorrow, Canterlot High School will be hosting our fellow students from Crystal Prep Academy as we join together in the spirit of excellence, sportsmanship, and fidelity to compete in the Friendship Games.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Since the games only happen every four years, I'm sure you're all curious what goes on.

speaker: Flash Sentry
text: You mean other than us losing?!

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: And *that* is exactly why I've asked Rainbow Dash to come up and give you all a little, um... context.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Thank you, Principal Celestia. [clears throat] I know a lot of you might think there's no way we can beat a fancy school like Crystal Prep at anything.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Unless it's a "losing to Crystal Prep" competition! 'Cause we're *really* good at that!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [groans] And I know that CHS has never won the Friendship Games even once.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, dear. I hope this speech isn't meant to be motivational.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Crystal Prep students are super athletic, super smart, and super motivated. But there's one thing they *aren't*. They aren't Wondercolts!

We've fought magic more than once

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Rainbow Dash, that was amazing! Even *I* feel like we can win!

speaker: Rarity
text: I feel like my school pride is at an all-time high!

speaker: Applejack
text: Is anybody else wonderin' how Dash ponied up without playin' her guitar?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I know, right? It's probably because I'm so awesome!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Maybe. I mean, you *are* awesome, but there's gotta be more to it than that, right? It just seems so random.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Well, it would be nice if you girls could get a handle on it. We'd like to keep magic as far away from the Friendship Games as possible. We don't want to be accused of cheating.

speaker: Rarity
text: We don't need magic to defeat those hoity-toity Crystal Preppers.

speaker: Princess Luna
text: Still, the Friendship Games are serious business. We don't want any surprises. Especially the kind that could cause us to forfeit. Sunset Shimmer, you came here from a world of magic. Perhaps you can get to the bottom of *our* magical development.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I'll do my best.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay. Anybody have any guesses what the events are gonna be?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Pie eating? Cake eating? [gasps] Pie-cake eating?!

speaker: Applejack
text: They won't even let us see what they're doin' to the field. You think they'd at least tell competitors what they're competing in.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: It could be anything.

speaker: Rarity
text: Anything?! How will I ever pick the right outfit?!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I really wanna help, but I think I better go focus on figuring out why Rainbow Dash ponied up. See ya later!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Seems like she's got everything under control. Nothing to worry about.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Ugh! [sighs] [voiceover] *Hey, Twilight. Haven't heard back from you yet. I guess you must be pretty busy with your role as princess. But I could really use your advice right now. You see, I've been given the job of keeping magic under control here at CHS, even though I still haven't quite wrapped my head around it. And now after seeing Rainbow Dash pony up the way she did, it makes me think her magic might be... changing. Everyone is looking to me to figure things out and I really don't wanna let them down. But I'm not sure I have enough experience with friendship magic to solve this.*

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: [deep breath] Excuse me. Sorry. Pardon me.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Spike? Spike?!

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: [giggles] There you are.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Okay, okay! Last night's field test confirmed it, Spike. With this device, I can track and contain the bizarre energy coming from Canterlot High.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: I know you didn't like me going over there, but I just couldn't wait. And soon, I'll have all the time I need. All of Crystal Prep is gonna be there for the Friendship Games. I just hope all that "rivalry" nonsense doesn't get in the way of my research. If I can collect enough data on these EM frequencies, I should be able to extrapolate the waveforms to determine their origin. That would practically guarantee my entrance into the Everton Independent Study Program! Whoa!

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: Twilight, you know the rules against pets.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Well, Spike isn't a pet, Dean Cadance. He's the focus of my research project. Human-canine cohabitation: effects and implications.

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: If you say so. But Principal Cinch is highly allergic, so I suggest you put on a clean shirt.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Why?

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: Because she wants to see you.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Ooh! Maybe she has news about my application to Everton!

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: I've been meaning to talk to you about that. Are you sure that's what you really want?

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Why wouldn't it be? A program that allows me to focus all my attention on my own advanced math and science projects? What a dream come true!

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: But there aren't any classrooms with other students. You'll be doing everything on your own.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: That *is* why it's called an "independent study program".

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: I just don't want you to miss out on anything. That's all. Being around other people isn't a bad thing. Sometimes it's how you learn the most about yourself.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: I guess.

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: Meet you in Principal Cinch's office in a few minutes?

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: [to Puppy Spike] What's she so worried about? Everton is exactly what I need right now. [sighs] It's not like I have anything left to learn at Crystal Prep.

Something to fill this hole inside

text: I'll find out someday...

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Shining Armor? Why is my brother here?

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: As an alumni, Principal Cinch thought he could provide some unique perspective.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Perspective on what?

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: Why, the Friendship Games, of course. You competed in the games, did you not, Shining Armor?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: [ahem] I did.

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: And you happen to recall who won?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Ha ha, Crystal Prep did. We *always* win.

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: We *always* win.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Why did you ask to see me?

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: Twilight, I'll be honest. It doesn't matter whether or not Crystal Prep wins or loses. [monkeyshine squeaks] The important thing is we are *expected* to win because Crystal Prep has a reputation. And it is that reputation... my reputation that is responsible for everything we have here. For everything you've done here. And you've done quite a lot, haven't you?

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: I don't know. I guess.

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: Oh, don't be modest. You're the best student this school has ever seen. What I can't understand is why my best student wouldn't want to compete.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: In the Friendship Games?

speaker: Shining Armor
text: Look, Twily, I know it's not really your thing, but representing the school is kind of a big deal. Plus, they could really use your help.

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: It seems Canterlot High is undergoing something of a renaissance. Test scores are up, grades, even athletics are on the rise. You see, they are developing somewhat of a reputation. This can *not* happen!

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Principal Cinch, I can't possibly participate in the games. My work here is very—

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: Ah, yes. Your work. Cadance, could you and Shining Armor find my contact sheet for the Everton Independent Study program?

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: Of course.

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: I understand you've applied. You see, one of the advantages of having a reputation is a certain amount of influence in such things. So, let me offer you a deal. In return for contributing your agile mind to these games, I will use my influence to guarantee your application is approved. Though, I suppose I could also have it... denied. What do *you* think I should do?

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Ugh! Come on, Spike! I was always gonna go to Canterlot High for the Friendship Games. Ich! The only difference *now* is that I have to compete. Besides, it's not like Principal Cinch gave me much of a choice.

text: I know, Spike. I don't like it either. I probably won't be able to collect anywhere near as much data as I thought. But maybe I can still get *some*.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: Spike, I wouldn't leave without you. Just remember to be quiet. And try not to shed.

text: Dean Cadance, I'm not really sure where to go.

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: One second, Twilight.

text: No. You *really* didn't have to.

speaker: Rarity
text: I know! [giggles]

text: Uh, yes?

speaker: Sci-Twi

speaker: Fluttershy
Rarity

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: And our music program has especially taken off. [gasps] Twilight?

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: This is getting ridiculous!

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: I must apologize for the curiosity of my prized student.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: *Your* student?

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: The smart ones are always curious. I'll return her to check in with the rest of her classmates.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: I didn't know Twilight had a twin sister.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: She doesn't! That Twilight is obviously the Twilight from *this* world since it couldn't possibly be the Twilight from the pony world since the Twilight from the pony world doesn't go to Crystal Prep or wear glasses.

speaker: Princess Celestia
text: Nevermind.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: I'm sorry, Principal Cinch. I was just following these strange readings. Actually, they led me to those girls and—

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: Twilight, what you do in your free time is of little interest to me, but while you're here, I... all of Crystal Prep, in fact, require your complete focus.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: But why does everyone at this school seem to know me?

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: Perhaps they're trying to confuse you. Perhaps they're trying to lure you away.

speaker: Sci-Twi
text: It didn't feel like anyone was trying to lure me.

speaker: Principal Cinch
text: I don't know what they're planning, but I guarantee, it isn't to help us win.

speaker: Rarity
text: I can't believe our world's Twilight goes to Crystal Prep!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You're saying that Twilight's gonna play *against* us? She'd never do that!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: *Our* Twilight wouldn't.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [angrily] Our Twilight is a princess in Equestria and an expert in friendship magic! And if *she* was here, we'd have already figured out why magic is randomly popping up during pep rallies and costume changes. [deep breath] Sorry. I'm just frustrated that I haven't heard back from her.

speaker: Applejack
text: She's a princess in Equestria. Probably got problems of her own to deal with.

speaker: Rarity
text: We certainly can't expect her to drop everything and pop through the portal whenever. Especially if it's to deal with something as minor as a few random pony-ups.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: But they aren't minor! Magic came into this world when I stole Twilight's crown. It's taken a lot for me to earn everyone's trust. If we have to forfeit the games because I can't think of a way to keep it under control...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, Sunset, I'm sure you'll be able to figure things out.

speaker: Applejack
text: You're the one who helped us understand what was goin' on with the sirens. Remember?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I guess. But Twilight was the one who really figured out what we needed to defeat them.

speaker: Rarity
text: But don't you remember, darling? What we needed to defeat them was you.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [sighs] All right.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Come on, guys! Let's see if we can find any info about the events and come up with a strategy. You comin', Sunset?

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: I'll... catch up with you guys in a bit.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: [sighs] Still no reply.

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: Maybe there's another way I could reach her. Hey, let go!

speaker: Sunset Shimmer
text: What did you do?!

speaker: Dean Cadance
text: Twilight, you have to check in with the others.

text: Where's the portal? [grunts] Where's the portal?!

text: Huh?
